attributes.action: Cut Benefits such as Income Support and increase Incapacity Benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister, is doing little to improve the quality of life of those who are disabled, as little funds are being issued.
Job Seeker's Allowance, and Income Support, should be manged more strictly, and slightly reduced, and cuts in the amount of people who receive this benefite, so more money can be re-compensated for those who are disabled.
